comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: How much a legendary account worth?  You might find that they don't even own any. Just looking for someone to scam. A legendary account is not worth selling. If someone is badly off, they could join a signature campaign of $70-$100 a week and earn something in no time. I mean, by the time someone thinks of selling a legendary account, they must be so stupid.Quote from: sujonali1819 on February 16, 2023, 02:02:42 PMI fill feel if bitcointalk has a rule that to create a topic/post they must have to buy a copper member,  it would be suitable for these people who are creating new accounts to scam people. If you deny such genuine newbies a chance, they won't return here.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: BROOP on February 16, 2023, 05:52:05 PMI have a legendary yes, im not trying to scam and i can prove the ownership in privateI do not think that you illegally obtained this account; it is clear that you hacked it from a member of the forum, or perhaps that you did not originally have a Legendary member account, and you are lying because if you have a Legendary account, you will not sell it for a few dollars, in exchange for the fact that if you work on it in signature campaigns, you will get hundreds of dollars a week. We did not claim that you are a scammer because there is no conclusive proof, but you are trying to underestimate our minds.I also never encourage buying forum accounts because it is effortless for the original owner to recover it one day through his initial email, the PGP key, or the associated bitcoin address.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5089777.0

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: ScamViruS on February 16, 2023, 06:15:03 PMIf you have a legendary account, why do you want to sell that account? There used to be a lot of such account selling posts on this forum, most of which were scams.If it is true that he owns that account, then it is most likely that it is an old account, and therefore it will become difficult for the user to collect more merits, which means that selling the account for 700 dollars is better than waiting for several weeks without joining the signature campaign.This is if he is not trying to defraud users or sell a hacked account.In any case, buying these accounts will lead you to lose your money sooner or later.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on February 16, 2023, 03:52:46 PMBack in the day, account farming was easy. So, there are people who have created a lot of accounts and now selling them  If you have insight from five or six years ago you can farm or collect legendary accounts and sell them now, back then people are targeting legendary accounts because of the signature campaign there are so many legit projects in the ICO back then where you can make thousands of dollars if you're legendary.But now that the ICO days are over and the majority of ICO signature campaigns are scams they have no use of these accounts and they do not want to participate in signature campaigns anymore so they are selling these higher rank accounts.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on February 19, 2023, 08:57:03 AMBut now that the ICO days are over and the majority of ICO signature campaigns are scams they have no use of these accounts and they do not want to participate in signature campaigns anymore so they are selling these higher rank accounts. You might be right and there are signature campaigns white main factor is the merit requirement and limitation of accepted applications so all the users who are legendary are not eligible to work on the signature campaigns so they might be interested to sell their account or defaulting loan or scam on the forum.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I really don't understand why someone would want to sell their legendary account. I spent a lot of effort and time until I got my legendary account and I will not sell it for any amount of money. This account really represents me because it represents my hard work all these years.Regardless, I do not think that the account has been hacked, because if that happened, it is certain that the original account holder will file a complaint here with the management of the forum and the issue will be revealed, so I rule out this possibility, but the possibility closest to my thinking is that he is no longer able to participate in signature campaigns due to his inactivity and inability to earn More merits or a good reputation that qualifies him to participate in campaigns.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on February 19, 2023, 09:01:05 AMQuote from: coin-investor on February 19, 2023, 08:57:03 AMBut now that the ICO days are over and the majority of ICO signature campaigns are scams they have no use of these accounts and they do not want to participate in signature campaigns anymore so they are selling these higher rank accounts. You might be right and there are signature campaigns white main factor is the merit requirement and limitation of accepted applications so all the users who are legendary are not eligible to work on the signature campaigns so they might be interested to sell their account or defaulting loan or scam on the forum.Selling a legendary account has risks in the community because there's always a reputation attached to those legendary accounts if it is good, and we tend to trust people holding those ranks, especially in the trading and loan section, there are always buyers of legendary accounts, especially those with projects coming up the community can easily trust a project when a legendary account is the one introducing the project.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I have mixed feelings on the issue of selling accounts. If the account is full of +trust and has a high chance of scamming, it shouldn't be sold. If it's a low/med rank with no big rep then not a big deal IMO. This being a Legendary I would want to see the trust on it before deciding on tagging. Selling accounts isn't illegal afterall. Maybe a neutral tag is warranted but not really anything more.
